Class Zip<O>

  • java.lang.Object

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZipLongest

    public class Zip<O>
extends Generator<O,java.util.List<O>>
    The Class Zip joins more lists toghether in this way: (1, 2, 3) zip (4, 5, 6) -> ((1, 4), (2, 5), (3, 6))
